title: r/AmITheA**hole For Refusing to Give My Wifi Password To My Entitled Neighbor?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP has an incredibly selfish neighbor who also has a very sweet young daughter. The neighbor is too poor for internet, which means that her daughter can't do her homework. OP gives his password to the neighbor's daughter on the condition that the daughter doesn't share it with anyone else, but his neighbor forces the daughter to cough it up. Then, the neighbor shared the password with the whole neighborhood!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
